meta.description: Real-time headlines covering health, government, prepardness, environment, liberty and more
meta.keywords: Health, Government, Spirituality, Preparedness, Environment, Weird, Liberty, Press Releases, Finance, Society

title: The Independent News Source for Free-Thinking People
cleaned_text:
Talking cars: New app will allow your car to tell you what it needs (like the car's software does) (Newstarget.com) - 10 Hours Ago

Have scientists programmed GMO food to reduce the population? Evidence suggests reduced sperm counts, especially in black men, are a result of weaponized food (Naturalnews.com)

Doctors bring nearly DEAD heart back to life using revolutionary new "box" that can keep it beating for eight hours (Naturalnews.com)

Sci-fi in real life: Scientists have developed a "smart fabric" that can store data in your clothes, without electronics (Naturalnews.com)

Choose trick over treat this Halloween: Thousands of candy brands found to contain lead, according to new study (Naturalnews.com)

Sensationalized science: New study suggests more than a quarter of scientific papers "spin" results (Newstarget.com)

New study examines complexity of dolphin culture; researchers determine that brain size correlates with "human-like" behaviors and societies (Naturalnews.com)

New hope for old antibiotics: Scientists have found a way to supercharge them for increased effectiveness against superbugs (Naturalnews.com)

Technology from the movies is on the way: A look at the many ways it will change our future (Naturalnews.com)

Your future vehicle will monitor your body fluids: New car monitors hydration levels and tells you when to drink water (Naturalnews.com)

Scientific group says fingerprint evidence in crimes is practically worthless (Naturalnews.com)

Bionic spider silk: Researchers have developed a super strong "biocomposite" with the potential to revolutionize numerous industries (Naturalnews.com)

Big brother in the car: New software detects when a driver is distracted or texting (Newstarget.com)

New AI can diagnose Alzheimer's 10 years before human doctors (Naturalnews.com)

Tesla caught "crippling" the battery life of cars, then controlling their discharge capacity from headquarters (Naturalnews.com)

Technology in the classroom: Robots could replace teachers in 10 years (Naturalnews.com)

Roads are too restrictive: Unmanned ghost ships are next on the automation radar (Naturalnews.com)

Same company that manufactures "Smart" TVs that spy on you now rolling out refrigerators that record everything you say (Naturalnews.com)

Real-time language translation device whispers into your ear in real time as it's listening to the person speaking (Naturalnews.com)

Human echolocation using mouth clicks is possible, study finds (Naturalnews.com)

Now SOUNDCLOUD joins anti-free speech zealots by censoring podcasts against Swedish migration (Newstarget.com)

Was the USS John S. McCain warship "GPS spoofed" to cause collision? (Newstarget.com)

Neighborhood watch goes CYBER surveillance: New device reads and logs license plates of all vehicles traveling private streets (Newstarget.com)

AI vehicles easily confused by simple stickers placed on road signs (Newstarget.com)

Google's "diversity indoctrination meetings" held in secret to avoid leaving any paper trail (Newstarget.com)

Rise of the robots: Bricklaying human labor nearly obsolete by 2020 (Newstarget.com)

Wisconsin company throws party to celebrate microchipping of its employees (Naturalnews.com)

Amazon awarded patent for "friendly" robot that stalks you around airports and retail outlets (Newstarget.com)

Chimpanzees found to accumulate and transfer cultural knowledge from one generation to the next (Naturalnews.com)

Secure quantum transmission of data from orbiting satellites has now been confirmed (Newstarget.com)

Inventor claims device will enable tech-augmented "telepathy" to function within a decade (Naturalnews.com)

Check out this list of once-common skills that have been destroyed by technology (Naturalnews.com)

Revealed: How Google almost killed ProtonMail and anyone else who challenges the system (Naturalnews.com)

Caterpillar gets behind massive brick-laying construction robot that can lay 1,000 bricks per hour (Newstarget.com)

Right out of science fiction: New elevator can move people horizontally as well as vertically (Newstarget.com)

NASA working on Earth defense technology to destroy asteroids that could obliterate human civilization (Naturalnews.com)

Mad scientists can erase memories from a snail's brain ? are humans next? (Naturalnews.com)

Insect-killing "laser battle robot" can zap 20 insects per second (Naturalnews.com)

New device detects presence of life-threatening superbugs in just two minutes (Naturalnews.com)

Amazon Echo devices can be exploited by hackers to steal your bank account information (Naturalnews.com)

Astronauts extremely likely to die from cancer if they travel to Mars, warns new science study (Naturalnews.com)

AI system claims to read minds of crime witnesses to reconstruct FACES of the criminals (Newstarget.com)

Human farmers obsolete? Drones and driverless tractors now being used to harvest crops autonomously (Naturalnews.com)

One with the machines: Man has compass implanted into his chest, becomes a cyborg (Newstarget.com)

Orwellian audio editing breakthrough allows your audio recordings to be edited like text to insert words you never said (Naturalnews.com)
